metadata.title: CVE-2022-48730 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dma-buf: heaps: Fix potential spectre v1 gadgetIt appears like nr could be a Spectre v1 gadget as it's supplied by auser and used as an array index. Prevent the contentsof kernel memory from being leaked to userspace via speculativeexecution by using array_index_nospec. [sumits: added fixes and cc: stable tags]
